thi-ap30:18.1: jānāmi → jānāma (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed)
thi-ap30:22.4: cattāni jīvitāni no → sañcattaṁ jīvitampi no (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap30:60.4: Pappotha → pappotha (sya1ed, sya2ed); santasaṅkhatadoso yo pappotha (pts-vp-pli1); pajjotaṁ (mr)
thi-ap30:66.4: ca sattatimeva ca → aṭṭhasattatimeva ca (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
